alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; North Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 2:41PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Walton, southwestern Holmes and north central Washington Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 141 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of De Funiak Springs, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bonifay, De Funiak Springs, Union, Ponce De Leon, Caryville, Westville, Leonia, Barker Store, Whitehead Crossroads, Cerrogordo, Prosperity, Darlington, Gritney, Arrant Settlement, Glendale, Five Points, Pleasant Hill, Center Ridge, Hulaw and Hickory Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
